text: "The Banner of Freedom" (, ) is the national anthem of Samoa. The lyrics and music was created by Sauni Iiga Kuresa. The anthem was adopted in 1962. == Lyrics == === Samoan original === Samoan original IPA transcription === English translations === Literal translation Common translation 𝄆 Samoa, arise and raise your flag, your crown! 𝄇 Look at those stars that are waving on it: This is the symbol of Jesus, who died on it for Samoa. Oh, Samoa, hold fast your power forever. Do not be afraid; God is our foundation, our freedom. Samoa, arise: your flag is waving, your crown! 𝄆 Samoa, arise and raise your banner that is your crown! 𝄇 Oh! See and behold the stars on the waving banner! They are a sign that Samoa is able to lead. Oh! Samoa, hold fast your freedom forever! Do not be afraid; as you are founded on God; Our treasured precious liberty. Samoa, arise and wave Your banner that is your crown! ==References== Category:Oceanian anthems Category:Samoa
title: The Banner of Freedom
